product_name: Thinksport Kids' Sunscreen SPF 50 - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Use Thinksport SPF 50 Kids' sunscreen to protect your children from the sun while they enjoy a midday hike or paddling session. Mineral-based sunscreen contains 20% zinc oxide for broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection. Formula is very water resistant so it won't come off easily while you're swimming or sweating. Thinksport sunscreen is a physical sunscreen, meaning it works immediately upon contact as opposed to chemical sunscreens, which require application prior to exposure to sun. Applies easily and absorbs quickly. 3 fl. oz. bottle is approved by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) for carry-on baggage. Thinksport SPF 50 sunscreen does not contain chemical UV absorbers, PABA, parabens or BPA.
short_description: Use Thinksport SPF 50 Kids' sunscreen to protect your children from the sun while they enjoy a midday hike or paddling session.
